issues.description: Constructor signature mismatch: H05E01ClientApplication instantiates PersonController using a default no-arg constructor, but in the solution PersonController only defines a parameterized constructor (String baseUrl, Duration timeout). This breaks compilation and prevents students from mapping the application code to the controller implementation.
